title: Cant go to fullscreen *HELP PLEASE*
body:
Hello, i just cant play in full screen.. only in windowed mode :/ I was lookin on internet and everybody sayin like change resolution for the same like your screen but still not working :/ it shows INPUT NOt SUPPORT. Any ideas how to fix it ? :(

Sorry if i did some mistakes. My english is not my primary language :P

replies.body: We had an issue like this a while back that was resolved, so it's interesting to hear this is happening to you.  Are you on a Mac?  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) for your specific issue, so our tech team can look into this with you.  We'll get to the bottom of this and get back to you!
